<title>Jun Zhai - Estimating Risk of Heart Disease with SAS</title>
</br>

### Heart Disease Risk with SAS
This is a final project for course P6110, building logistic model to predict the risk of having heart disease with dozens of clinical test results, using the UCI data set [Heart Disease](https://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/datasets/Heart+Disease).  
The model is building in SAS. [original SAS code](SAS.sas)
